author: Staff Reporter
text:
The State Government has decided to distribute 8,54,814 free saris and dhoties for Pongal festival to those below poverty line in Kanyakumari district, according to sources in the district administration.

The sources also said on Thursday that 4,28,113 people would be distributed dhoties, and 4,26,701 women saris from Friday (January 1).

Collector Sajjansingh R. Chavan would inaugurate the distribution of saris and dhoties at the office of the Village Administrative Officers in Vadaseri near Krishnankoil in Nagercoil town on Friday morning.
title: Free dhoties, saris to be given
